RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the officers: Gary Haston and Jason Cox and Heather Vargas

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Federico Saldana: defendant in a case involving a motion to suppress, truck driver, has a history of arrests including smuggling of illegal aliens and drugs, exhibited signs of nervousness during questioning
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston: veteran narcotics investigator with 17 years of experience, testified to observations about the truck and scissor lift, witnessed two near-collisions, and contacted a patrol deputy for a traffic stop, gathered information from Saldana during the stop, strongly encouraged Saldana to cooperate regarding potential drug trafficking
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Heather Vargas: relative newcomer to the narcotics division, involved in contacting a patrol deputy
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Daniel Martin Huerta: registered owner of the trailer, person who hired Saldana to drive the scissor lift to Dallas for repairs
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Jason Cox: Deputy who initiated the traffic stop, handled paperwork and searched for registration documents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Gary Haston and Jason Cox and Heather Va: officers involved in the traffic stop and investigation of Saldana
